title: Clash game didnt register/work
body: After clash game started, message displayed "Error starting game". However, it booted one game and everyone connected to that. There was another champion select lobby launched afterwards and everyone had to repick their champs? This went champ select lobby was on a continuous loop at which people had to keep picking/banning which eventually stopped after a while. We finished the game that was booted (we won) however it has been registered as a loss with no stats applied from the game to the team. The opposing team did not go through to the next round either.

replies.body:
Hey! Sorry to hear about that, personally clash was a little underwhelming due to the many yasuo smurfs, but oh well that was my experience. 

I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as no one here is really able to help, it seems like a technical issue so talking with a riot employee would be the best course of action.

Also I advise getting as much material (such as client logs etc) and submitting it along with your ticket so the technician can check out your situation!

Good luck, Summoner! :)

(Official Rioter comment on another post like this, [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/iWxeammU-second-clash-game-crashed?comment=0000)
